column2: Marilyn was exceptionally nice. She understood when ordering
column3: we would appreciate it if only two dishes came out and not all at once. She timed it so there was a heavy dish paired up with a lighter dish. Our dishes complimented each other in taste and they didn't fight against each other. The only time we were stumped was when it came time for desserts. I opted for a chocolate truffle cake. It comes with kuluha and a dollop of whipped cream. I can hear my waist line popping. So worth it. I'll run on the treadmill for an extra hour. Yes
